title: peruvAi manamE
sahitya:
peruvAi manamE urudiyAgavE muruganai tudi sheidAl gati nI


anupallavi

  varumaiyum sirumaiyum vandaNugAda oru perumida vAzhvum pErinbap-pErum


caraNam    satya sanmArga shAnta shIlarAna uttamap-periyOrin tittikkum uravum 
nityamAna nanneri nirkkum nErmaiyAna cittamum sIrAna bhaktiyum muktiyum
